publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-716.1 Mark Ballard: 4th Report 2003 (Session 2) of the Finance Committee, Stage 2 of the 2004-05 Budget Process-As an amendment to motion (S2M-716) in the name of Des McNulty, insert at end "and considers that the deficiencies highlighted in the report that currently prevent full scrutiny of cross-cutting themes, particularly sustainable development, should be addressed by the Scottish Executive when preparing future budgets."
